page.title: 09Events,Earlston
page.content:
{ Civic Week}is held annually at the beginning of July. A civic week committee, made up of local people, thought that Earlston needed to have some kind of festival week because all the other villages and towns had one. Civic Week is made up of family entertainment which includes, fancy dress, talent competitions,concerts, dances, discos, various sports and over 60's evenings.
{Rugby Sevens}are held annually in September when seven-a-side teams from all over the Borders area come to play in the competition. The winners are presented with a silver cup.
